master:
1. Clear all ｢Master Missions｣ for this week

2. Defeat 30 Enemies (NOT inclusive of Servants or Bosses).

3. 	Defeat 15 Saber class Enemies.

4. 	Defeat 15 Caster class Enemies.

5. Defeat 15 Assassin class Enemies.

6. 	Defeat 15 Berserker class Enemies.

7. Obtain 3 Shining Gem, Magic Gem or Secret Gem of any class from Quests.
